plot: An American Bio-Technologist must race against time and heavy odds to try and retrieve a deadly chemical in a vial.
title: Dasavatharam
plot_es: An American Bio-Technologist must race against time and heavy odds to try and retrieve a deadly chemical in a vial.
plot_en: An American Bio-Technologist must race against time and heavy odds to try and retrieve a deadly chemical in a vial.
